leaderboards - Variable in class com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.control.GameBoard
 
Leaderboards - Class in com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.leaderboards
This is a collection of the Score object that has methods to sort, access and save high scores to a persistent file.
Leaderboards() - Constructor for class com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.leaderboards.Leaderboards
Automatically initialises and loads the high score file saved.
Leaderboards(int) - Constructor for class com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.leaderboards.Leaderboards
The constructor that is used for testing which does not load or initialise any leaderboards file.

LeaderboardsView - Class in com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.leaderboards
The object that displays the leaderboards as a table GUI.
LeaderboardsView(Leaderboards) - Constructor for class com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.leaderboards.LeaderboardsView
Constructor that shows a table based on the leaderboard object received.

LINE_COUNT - Static variable in class com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.control.GameBoard
 
loadHighScoresFromFile() - Method in class com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.leaderboards.Leaderboards
Once the leaderboards file is pointed to, this method will read each score line by line and append it to the list of scores in memory.
loadScoreFromString(String) - Method in class com.hcyic1.brickdestroy.leaderboards.Leaderboards
Converts a single line of scores into a Score object and adds it to the leaderboards.
